text: The 2008–09 New Jersey Devils season was the team's 26th season in the National Hockey League since the franchise relocated to New Jersey. == Regular season == ==Playoffs== The Devils lost to the Carolina Hurricanes in the Conference Quarter-Finals 3 games to 4. ==References== Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:2009 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2000s in New Jersey Category:2008 in the United States Category:2009 in the United States
title: 2008–09 New Jersey Devils season
